javadoc: Thread responsible for executing a python script from a file.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a new python script execution thread that executes the given python script.

params.name: interpreter
params.comment: The python interpreter to use for execution.

params.name: interpreterRunning
params.comment: Gets set to indicate whether or not the interpreter is still running the script.

name: PythonScriptExecutionThread
comment: Thread responsible for executing a python script from a file.
